meanings.definition: Strengthened or supported with additional material or structures.
meanings.sent1: The reenforced bridge stood firm against the strong winds.
meanings.sent2: The reenforced walls of the castle provided extra protection.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was reenforced with special fibers to make it indestructible.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a reenforced shield, protecting her from negativity.
meanings.sent5: The reenforced steel beams gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing their strength.

meanings.definition: Made stronger or more resilient through additional measures.
meanings.sent1: The reenforced door withstood the attempted break-in.
meanings.sent2: The reenforced team spirit helped them overcome the tough challenge.
meanings.sent3: The reenforced umbrella saved the day during the sudden downpour.
meanings.sent4: His reenforced resolve was unshakable in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The reenforced friendship between them grew even stronger over time.
